[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Neéos Child Care Management (NCCM) defines requirements for a child care management system to streamline administrative and operational tasks.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: NCCM automates child care operations, including attendance tracking, billing, reminders, and compliance.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: NCCM integrates with web browsers and centralized databases for secure storage.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: NCCM provides role-based dashboards for administrators, teachers, and assistants.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: NCCM operates on devices supporting web browsers with internet access.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: NCCM utilizes ASP.NET for development and connects with reporting tools.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: NCCM ensures secure data exchange using HTTP/HTTPS.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: NCCM securely stores child and staff records with optimized memory use.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: NCCM enables real-time attendance tracking, reminders, and automated billing.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: NCCM supports flexible configurations for different child care centers.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: NCCM integrates with payment gateways and third-party reporting services.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: NCCM tracks attendance, generates invoices, manages immunization records, and produces reports.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: NCCM is designed for administrators, teachers, and assistants with basic computer proficiency.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: NCCM depends on ASP.NET-supported web servers and stable internet connectivity.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: NCCM assumes users have access to supported browsers and hardware.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Daily Reminder: Automated notifications for scheduled tasks.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall support login functionality with unique usernames and passwords.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall provide dashboards with role-specific access to features.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall track child arrival and departure times for billing (REQ-FUNC-002).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall maintain records of authorized child pickup individuals (REQ-INTF-54).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall generate invoices with detailed billing information (REQ-PERF-001, REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall manage classroom waiting lists dynamically.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide intuitive interfaces with clear navigation (REQ-FUNC-002).

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process attendance records within 3 seconds of submission (REQ-FUNC-67).

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store child attendance and billing records for a minimum of 1 year (REQ-INTF-001).

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall follow security best practices, including password encryption (REQ-INTF-99).

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with child care data privacy regulations.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall maintain 99% uptime during operational hours.

[SEC] 3. Verification: Unit testing for login, billing, and integration testing for dashboards and reminders.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals, technical guides, and configuration examples.
[SEC] 5. References: NCCM User Guide, ASP.NET Development Manual, Data Privacy Regulations.
